people.label: Person to move
people.hint: Select the person you are moving

details.summaryHtml: I need to change the PNC number
details.html: If you have created the move for the wrong person cancel this request and create a new one

gender_additional_information.label: More information
gender_additional_information.hint: Give more information if this person’s gender identity may put them at risk from others, or pose a risk to others

has_date_to.label: Is there a date this move has to be completed by?
has_date_to.label_with_error: Whether a move needs to be completed by a date

no.label: No
no.hint: A court date will not be added to NOMIS

court_hearing__start_time.label: Time of first hearing
court_hearing__start_time.hint: We only require the time of the earliest hearing to book the move

court_hearing__court_case.label: What court case is this move for?
court_hearing__court_case.hint: The case must exist in NOMIS to appear here

should_save_court_hearings.label: Would you like to add this court date to NOMIS?

review_decision.label: Can this move be requested with the supplier?

move_date.label: Date of travel
move_date.hint_with_date_range: Travel has been requested for between {{date}}

items.no_transport_available: No transport available for this move

items.rebook_in_7_days_only_if_required: Rebook in 7 days only if still required

cancellation_reason.label: Why are you cancelling this move request?

made_in_error.label: Made in error
made_in_error.hint: For example, there’s a mistake or the person no longer needs to move

supplier_declined_to_move.label: Supplier declined to move this person
supplier_declined_to_move.hint: For example, the request was made late

special_vehicle__explicit.label: Does this person need to travel in a special vehicle?
special_vehicle__explicit.hint: This could be a specially-adapted prison van (for example, to accomodate wheelchairs)

not_to_be_released__explicit.label: Is there a reason this person should not be released?
not_to_be_released__explicit.hint: For example, they may be wanted by immigration or recalled to custody

documents.heading: Only include documents that will help plan the move.
documents.label: Upload a file (optional)
documents.hint: You can upload Word, Excel, PDF and JPEG documents up to 50 megabytes

move_agreed_by.label: Name of person who agreed the move

complete_in_full.label: Does this allocation have to be filled in full?

has_other_criteria.label: Is there any other criteria you need to add?

complex_cases.label: Prisoners with complex cases
complex_cases.label_with_data: Complex cases for prisons to agree
complex_cases.hint: Complex cases should be discussed with the receiving prison. This includes:

cancel_allocation_reason.label: Why are you cancelling this allocation?

made_in_error.label: Made in error
made_in_error.hint: For example, there’s a mistake or the allocation no longer needs to happen

supplier_declined_to_move.label: Supplier declined to complete this allocation
supplier_declined_to_move.hint: For example, the request was made late

lack_of_space.label: Lack of space at receiving establishment

unfilled.label: Sending establishment failed to fill allocation

confirm_person_escort_record.label: Check this box to confirm that, to the best your knowledge, all information provided in this Person Escort Record is correct
